snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [989] Flame Gunner (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: KAGE-008

Developed by Gaps Inc, this one seems to be their last game released.

The story involves three soldiers, named Kai, Tiala and Falcon, where their main objective is to stop the launch of a nuclear rocket that's threatening humanity. Some missions require you to complete certain tasks before it runs out of time or defending allies during the entire level. After completing a mission, it lets you choose any path to proceed, this doesn't affect the story though.

Timestamps (each character has taken a different path):
00:46 -- Kai's playthrough
21:36 -- Tiala's playthrough
37:59 -- Falcon's playthrough

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
